item.title: sample
item.description: Simple put diagram in div@mermaid <div class="mermaid"> mermaid diagrams </div> include mermaid.js at bottom <script async src="https://unpkg.com/mermaid/dist/mermaid.min.js"></script> See mermaid document graph LR; A[startnow]; B[end]; C{filter?} D[[filter]] A-->C C--no-->B C--yes-->D E[(Database)]
